task.title: Customize to Render CGM Images (Experimental Support)

CGM image rendering in Author mode

p.note: This support will only work on 32 bit versions of .

context.p: provides experimental support for CGM 1.0 images. To render the images in Author mode, requires the use of an ISOView Active X component for Internet Explorer, so this component must be installed even if you do not use Internet Explorer.
Follow this procedure to allow the rendering of CGM images in Author mode:

step.cmd: Install the ISOView Active X browser plugin. For example, you can find it, along with instructions, here: .
Go to and follow the instruction to install the CGM Form Control plugin.
Modify your CSS according to your particular framework.
Unpack the ZIP archive and copy the cgmpanel.jar into the \lib directory.
Open OXYGEN_PLUGIN_DIR/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF and add a reference to the JAR library in the Bundle-ClassPath entry.

cmd.ph: Restart Eclipse in clean mode (edit the shortcut you use to start Eclipse and add -clean as the first argument.)
